name: Turkish Textile Employers' Association
goal:
Founded in 1962, The Turkish Textile Employers’ Association (TTEA) is the first employers’ association of Turkey. Its main task is to negotiate labor and employment terms with workers’ unions and conclude impartial collective labor agreements.

TTEA advocates its members’ common economic and social interests regarding industrial relations and assist them in achieving a productive and compatible working environment through sustained labor peace in textile and related industries.

TTEA also monitors global developments in the industry on behalf of its members through its participation at international platforms like EURATEX, ITMF, IWTO, and Textile Institute.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: REACH Directive, Customs Union, Trade Policies, Employment & Social Affairs
